Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Protective Agent/Chemoprotective Agent/Miscellaneous Chemoprotective Agent/Biomed 101
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An agent binding to the leukotriene B4 receptor, leading to reduced interleukin-2 mediated hypoxia. Biomed 101 does not affect interleukin-2 antitumor activity. (NCI04)
